job_title: Family Nurse Practitioner in Cleveland, OH
pros: Good community/family oriented atmosphere. Supportive colleagues. Opportunity for growth. Decent holidays, vacation time. Qualifies for loan repayment.
cons: A lot of responsibilities wrapped into salary. 22 patients a day, covering other providers vacations, on call, administrative responsibilities.

pros: Competitive medical, dental and vision policy. Low cost short term disability. Benefits offered for part-time employees. Family environment and caring staff.
cons: A busy practice that can feel overwhelming, but everyone manages and keeps patient care in the forefront.
